policy_integration_status: Humor signals are mapped to rewards through the HumorSignalPolicy which calculates bonus factors from 7-dimensional humor vectors. Caps and gates include a maximum humor bonus of 25% and policy toggles for enabling/disabling humor rewards and recognition-only mode.
observability_status: Comprehensive observability is provided through the HumorSignalObservatory which tracks statistics, distributions, correlations, and anomalies. Operators can access metrics through the humor_observatory_cli.py tool which provides summary statistics, dimension distributions, top performing content, and correlation analysis.
explainability_status: Explainability is provided through the HumorExplainabilityHelper which generates detailed breakdowns of humor reward calculations. The 'Explain Humor' feature is exposed through API endpoints and provides both detailed technical explanations and simplified user-facing summaries with verification hashes.
